title: PC2 Subsystem Deployment & Synchronization Plan
description: Deploy and optimize PC2 subsystem with 7 service groups, implementing cross-machine sync with Main PC

phases.description: Setup Docker environment and apply NATS hot-patch

todos.description: Apply NATS connectivity hot-patch to PC2 codebase (localhost:4222 → nats_pc2_*:4222)
Create Docker directory structure for 7 PC2 service groups
Setup PC2 environment variables (NATS_URL, REDIS_URL, MAINPC_OBS_HUB)

phases.description: Generate Docker compose files for each PC2 service group

todos.description: Generate docker-compose for PC2 infra_core group (ObservabilityHub, ResourceManager)
Generate docker-compose for PC2 memory_stack group (5 agents)
Generate docker-compose for PC2 async_pipeline group (4 agents)
Generate docker-compose for PC2 tutoring_cpu group (2 agents)
Generate docker-compose for PC2 vision_dream_gpu group (3 agents)
Generate docker-compose for PC2 utility_suite group (6 agents)
Generate docker-compose for PC2 web_interface group (1 agent)

phases.description: Setup synchronization between PC2 and Main PC ObservabilityHubs

todos.description: Setup VPN/SSH tunnel for PC2 ↔ Main PC communication
Configure ObservabilityHub cross-machine sync (PC2 → Main PC)
Setup Redis replication for shared state between PC2 and Main PC
Configure NATS cross-machine bridges for message passing

phases.description: Deploy PC2 service groups in dependency order with testing

todos.description: Deploy & test PC2 infra_core group (ObservabilityHub, ResourceManager)
Deploy & test PC2 memory_stack group (5 memory agents)
Deploy & test PC2 async_pipeline group (async processing)
Deploy & test PC2 utility_suite group (support services)
Deploy & test PC2 tutoring_cpu group (educational agents)
Deploy & test PC2 vision_dream_gpu group (GPU workloads)
Deploy & test PC2 web_interface group (user-facing web)

phases.description: End-to-end testing and optimization of PC2 subsystem

todos.description: Execute comprehensive PC2 integration tests (all 7 groups)
Optimize PC2 performance and resource utilization
Validate bidirectional sync between PC2 and Main PC systems
Execute security validation tests for PC2 subsystem

dependencies: Main PC multimodal AI platform (91% operational)
Network connectivity between Main PC and PC2
completion_criteria: All 7 PC2 service groups deployed and operational
Cross-machine sync functioning between PC2 and Main PC
Integration tests passing with >90% success rate
